mapper.sql: a.id AS "noticeId", a.type, a.target, a.title, a.notices, a.pubuser, a.pubtime, a.status, a.file_path, a.file_name
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM hotel_system_notices a
LEFT JOIN hotel_user b ON b.user_type = a.target OR a.target='0'
WHERE 1=1
AND b.user_id = #{userId}
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.status = #{status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.pubtime, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.pubtime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.pubtime DESC

SELECT
FROM hotel_system_notices a LEFT JOIN hotel_user b ON b.user_type = a.target OR a.target='0' WHERE a.status='1' AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.pubtime > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)

SELECT a.id AS "noticeId", a.type, a.target, a.title, a.notices, b.user_name AS "pubUser", a.pubtime, a.status, a.file_path, a.file_name FROM hotel_system_notices a LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail b ON a.pubuser = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_system_notices ( type, target, title, notices, pubuser, pubtime, status, file_path, file_name )VALUES( #{type}, #{target}, #{title}, #{notices}, #{pubUser}, #{pubTime}, '1', #{filePath}, #{fileName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hotel_system_notices a SET a.status = '2' WHERE a.status='1' AND NOW()>DATE_ADD(a.pubtime, INTERVAL 1 WEEK);
